Meticulously crafted from Dubarry's signature DryFast-DrySoft leather, this iconic boot will bring an air of sophistication to your wet-weather wardrobe. Lined with GORE-TEX® they also have comfortable shock absorbing soles, a finger pull fitted to aid easy entry and subtle signature Dubarry and GORE-TEX® branding. The Galway boot looks great with trousers or a skirt and will see you from muddy country walks to a smart day at the races.

prompt: Product Code -  is 35220528. Sport & Fitness Activity is Walking, Hiking & Camping. Washing Instructions is Hand Wash Only. Brand is Salomon. Occasion Type is Casual. Performance Running Type is Trail. Main Shoe Material is Synthetic. Shoe Or Boot Style is Walking. Fabric Features is Waterproof. Heel Type is Flat. Type is Trail & Walking Shoes. Comfort and Fit is Flexible Sole, Underfoot Cushioning. Material is Upper: synthetic textile, Sole: rubber.
completion:
Inspired by the best-selling X Ultra Family, this mid-cut hiking shoe is the go-to option for outdoor enthusiasts. The X ULTRA PIONEER is packed with all the technology you need including waterproof protection, yet versatile enough to adapt to daily life.

Two types of rubber and a patterned heel area grab the ground, giving you more control in muddy conditions. While the waterproof membrane keeps the wet out.

A reinforced SensiFit™ construction holds your foot comfortably in place, especially on those tough downhills.

Surrounded by foam cushioning for comfort, the Advanced Chassis™ connects directly to the sole to stabilize your heel. The higher cut wraps the ankle for extra protection.

completion:
UGG's Classic Short Boot was originally worn by surfers to keep warm after early-morning sessions, and has since become iconic for its soft sheepskin and enduring design. Incorporating a durable, lightweight sole to increase cushioning and traction, these versatile boots pair well with practically anything. Try yours with loose boyfriend jeans and a velvet top.
This product was made in a factory that supports women in the supply chain with the help of HERproject, a collaborative initiative that creates partnerships with brands like UGGs to empower and educate women in the workplace.
